text: Need Michael Rodriguez for Betty's Burgers campaign. Budget around $10,947, looking for 1 x Instagram post, 2 x Product photography, 1 x 60-second YouTube video, 3 x 60-second YouTube video, 1 x Live stream. 11 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
